document.full_text: tibet's parliament-in-exile has formed a committee to hand over political power from the dalai lama, in a signal his devolution of power will get approval despite opposition from lawmakers.
document.title: tibet parliament prepares for dalai lama retirement
lines_and_colors: tibet's parliament-in-exile has formed a committee to hand over political power from the dalai lama, in a signal his devolution of power will get approval despite opposition from lawmakers.
